description: Discover supported verification scopes and the claims they provide. Initiate and monitor data wallet verification flows to securely receive redacted wallet data. Clean up completed sessions to keep workflows organized.

tools.name: get_supported_scopes
tools.description: Return supported scopes, the claims each scope returns, and available verifier profiles.

tools.name: start_wallet_verification
tools.description: Create a wallet request as a QR code image or deeplink.

scope.description: Claims: profile→ family_name,given_name,birth_date; email→ email_address; phone→ mobile_phone_number; over18→ age attestation; wallet_identifier→ DID only; custom→ use your own Presentation Definition.

tools.name: poll_wallet_verification
tools.description: Poll current status for a session; returns structured status and redacted wallet_data.

tools.name: revoke_wallet_flow
tools.description: Acknowledge cleanup for a session id (back-end TTL handles actual expiration).
